A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Haven't seen a Star Wars film this bad since The Phantom Menace. 

The 2 big deaths that happen in this film are so weak. Snoke dies like a clown. Why even bother pretending his was ever strong? He's like the Jar Jar Binks of the Sith.

Luke dies in VERY weak fashion. Without even a duel? Obi Wan at least fought with his advisory before sacrificing himself. Luke just stood there. He basically died exactly like Han.

Leia can fly like superman now... yuck.

Finn and Rose... yuck. 

The run time is WAY too long. 

I wanted to like this\, but just left very disappointed

I'm not understanding all the positive reviews for this film. I can only assume they were afraid of being blacklisted by Disney.
